simple_question_asking_response_as_text.template:
What are the diseases mentioned in the following text?
{tokens | join(" ") | replace(" .", ".") | replace(" ,", ",") | replace(" ;", ";") | replace(" :", ":") | replace(" -", "-")}

identify_diseases_names_mentioned.template:
Identify the names of diseases mentioned in the following text (if no diseases are mentioned, output {"None"}):
{tokens | join(" ") | replace(" .", ".") | replace(" ,", ",") | replace(" ;", ";") | replace(" :", ":") | replace(" -", "-")}

question_asking_diseases_presence.template:
Are there diseases mentioned in the following text?
{tokens | join(" ") | replace(" .", ".") | replace(" ,", ",") | replace(" ;", ";") | replace(" :", ":") | replace(" -", "-")}

list_diseases_mentioned_after_text.template:
{tokens | join(" ") | replace(" .", ".") | replace(" ,", ",") | replace(" ;", ";") | replace(" :", ":") | replace(" -", "-")}
List the diseases mentioned in the previous text.

list_diseases_mentioned.template:
List the diseases mentioned in the following text (write {"None"} if no disease is mentioned):
{tokens | join(" ") | replace(" .", ".") | replace(" ,", ",") | replace(" ;", ";") | replace(" :", ":") | replace(" -", "-")}
